column5: Hi All, Just wondering if anyone has fished at Depot Harbour in the past.Saw a couple videos on Utube. The Good,Bad, best time of year, what you have to do to fish there? We were at Parry Sound for a night and was yakking with hotel owner- looking at things I might be able to get my wife to do with me fishing wise if it is not an all day adventure.This would not be during the ice season!! Thanks Kerry
You can PM me. I will share some details.
